snippet: Financial aid and global coordination are needed to prevent the Ebola health care crisis from becoming a food emergency, agriculture ministers from West African nations at the center of the Ebola outbreak said Wednesday....

headline.print_headline: African Leaders: Ebola Could Lead to Food Crisis
headline.main: African Leaders: Ebola Could Lead to Food Crisis

lead_paragraph: Financial aid and global coordination are needed to prevent the Ebola health care crisis from becoming a food emergency, agriculture ministers from West African nations at the center of the Ebola outbreak said Wednesday.
